categories: Top Down Solid No Show Socks
description: Seeing isn't always believing. These comfy and super-low-cut socks hide inside your shoes – once your shoes are on, these socks are gone.Lightweight merino blend with no cushioning to smoothly glide into close-fitting shoes without bunching.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and prevents your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
name: Darn Tough Top Down Solid No Show Socks - Women's
